archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Provide Loyalty Program Operation Report
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Generate a loyalty program operation report, such as various loyalty program status reports, trend analysis, and reports that identify suspected abuse of a loyalty program.

properties.value: Provide Loyalty Program Operation Report generates a loyalty program operation report, such as various loyalty program status reports, trend analysis, and reports that identify suspected abuse of a loyalty program. Recipient lists are maintained by a generalized process that should be developed and added to the Common Enterprise Process grouping in the Enterprise domain.
